pull.title: 0.18: Granular invalidateblock and RewindBlockIndex
pull.body:
Same repo and branch like  "Granular invalidateblock and RewindBlockIndex #15402 ", can be merged as is.

This saves us all the cherry-picks and review of the backport cherry-picks.

events.message:
Abstract EraseBlockData out of RewindBlockIndex

Note that the former 'else' branch in RewindBlockIndex is now
dealt with more naturally inside the EraseBlockData call (by
checking whether the parent needs to be re-added as candidate
after deleting a child).

Move erasure of non-active blocks to a separate loop in RewindBlockIndex

This lets us simplify the iteration to just walking back in the chain,
rather than looping over all of mapBlockIndex.
Merge the disconnection and erasing loops in RewindBlockIndex
Prevent callback overruns in InvalidateBlock and RewindBlockIndex
Optimization: don't add txn back to mempool after 10 invalidates
Make last disconnected block BLOCK_FAILED_VALID, even when aborted

comments.body: @jonatack that should go in the original #15402 (though probably won't be fixed in order not to lose existing ACKs)
